entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
